titleInfo.title: File 4301/1916 Pt 3 'Persia:- Re-building of Kermanshah Consulate'

mods.abstract: This part contains India Office Minute papers and correspondence between the India Office and the Foreign Office, regarding the re-building of HM Consulate at Kermanshah in Persia [Iran] (which was destroyed in the First World War) during the financial year 1924-25, and the expenditure involved.
